resource.chars:
think the Royal Society is really 
responsible for the decision that 
Mr Berucchi’s estimate of his 
retaining fees was beyond its means 
and we must put up with his 
efforts to revenge himself as best 
we can.
Still I feel it rather 
hard to be made the whipping 
boy of the situation because 
in a weak moment I yielded to 
the pressure put on me to undertake 
what I knew must be a thankless task.
Yours sincerely 
W.N. Shaw
